CustomField.description:
This date is calculated using the Order Valid in Days field in Kugamon Settings from the creation date of this Order.
Draft and Sent Orders: - Applies to Both PDF and Online Order, where Blank means Online Order Page never Expires.
Approved and Released Orders: - Does not apply. Online Order Page never Expires regardless of Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Blank = Online Order Pages Never Expire
CustomField.label: Expiration Date
